title: Pyramid
description: An employee directory that allows the user to filter and sort their employee information. Built with React, Material UI, and the RandomUser API.

title: Gitworkd
description: A platform for hosting and exploring open source projects. Built with JavaScript, Handlebars, Node, Express, and MySQL.

title: Pitch
description: An application that allows the user to explore and log their musical explorations. Built with jQuery, Materialize, and several external APIs.

title: Raviga
description: A fitness tracker application used to log and track workouts in order for the user to reach fitness goals.  My job was to hook up the MongoDB backend with the provided front end.  Built with JavaScript, Node, Express, Mongoose, and MongoDB.

title: BurgerBase
description: An application used to log your favorite burgers! Built with Node.js, Express, MySQL, Handlebars, and ORM.

title: ClearSky
description: A weather dashboard application that display the current weather of a city and it's 5 day forecast. Built with jQuery, Bootstrap, and the OpenWeatherMap API.
